metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7966 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Through a malicious URL that contained a quote character it was possible toinject HTML code in KMail's plaintext viewer. Due to the parser used on theURL it was not possible to include the equal sign (=) or a space into theinjected HTML, which greatly reduces the available HTML functionality.Although it is possible to include an HTML comment indicator to hidecontent.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7966` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

kdepimlibs-kio-plugins - 4:4.13.3-0ubuntu0.4
libakonadi-calendar4 - 4:4.13.3-0ubuntu0.4
libakonadi-contact4 - 4:4.13.3-0ubuntu0.4
